item.title: IA Wants You to Pick a Location For Her!
item.dc:creator: Lune☯n
item.description:
Have you always dreamed of having IA visit your town? Well, now’s your chance! On both Twitter and Facebook, the IA World Page and Hachimaki are requesting your input. If you want IA to perform “ARIA” in your town, you can let them know right now by telling them what city and country you’d like …

The post IA Wants You to Pick a Location For Her! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Have you always dreamed of having IA visit your town? Well, now’s your chance!

On both Twitter and Facebook, the IA World Page and Hachimaki are requesting your input. If you want IA to perform “ARIA” in your town, you can let them know right now by telling them what city and country you’d like to see IA at, and why they should bring her over!

There is no specific deadline stated as of yet.

More information

1st PLACE (owner of IA) is on Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, Soundcloud, Youtube and has a website
IA has a global Facebook page and a Bilibili channel
Hachimaki is Facebook (English) and on Twitter (English/Japanese)
Hachimaki Goods Shop (Europe/Japanese)

The post IA Wants You to Pick a Location For Her! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Snow Miku x Hello Kitty goods now available!
item.dc:creator: Lune☯n
item.description:
A Hello Kitty related Twitter account specialized in local tourist merchandise (known as Gotochi Kitty) tweeted out some sweet goods based on an illustration made by artist Saine-san. Candy Multi-case First up is a multi-case filled with candies. These come in two flavors, strawberry milk and cider. In addition, it is accompanied with a carabiner, …

The post Snow Miku x Hello Kitty goods now available! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
A Hello Kitty related Twitter account specialized in local tourist merchandise (known as Gotochi Kitty) tweeted out some sweet goods based on an illustration made by artist Saine-san.

Candy Multi-case

First up is a multi-case filled with candies. These come in two flavors, strawberry milk and cider. In addition, it is accompanied with a carabiner, allowing you to attach it to your bag.

These will be available starting from July 12th, priced 550 JPY each.

Tin can with Rhinestones

Shortly after, the same Twitter page announced a tin can embedded with rhinestones for putting gum in.

There’s two designs available and they cost 500 JPY per can.

Those will be available starting July 19th!

Where to buy

You will find those goods at New Chitose Airport and Hokkaido’s souvenir shops!

More information

Hatsune Miku is on Facebook (English and Japanese), Twitter (English and Japanese), Youtube and Weibo!
Sanrio Japan (owner of Hello Kitty) has an own website (Japanese and English), is on Youtube, Twitter and Facebook
Gotochi Kitty is on Twitter and Facebook
Piapro blog containing the illustrations

The post Snow Miku x Hello Kitty goods now available! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Hatsune Miku x Digimon Adventure Merchandise Revealed!
item.dc:creator: Lune☯n
item.description:
In celebration of Digimon Adventure’s 20th anniversary, a special collaboration with virtual diva Hatsune Miku was announced back on March 5th, and now we get some updates on goods! A Digital Diva in a Digital World! The main visual created by Atsuya Uki portrays Miku floating together with Agumon. This image mirrors the first visual …

The post Hatsune Miku x Digimon Adventure Merchandise Revealed! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
In celebration of Digimon Adventure’s 20th anniversary, a special collaboration with virtual diva Hatsune Miku was announced back on March 5th, and now we get some updates on goods!

A Digital Diva in a Digital World!

The main visual created by Atsuya Uki portrays Miku floating together with Agumon. This image mirrors the first visual released for the Digimon Tri movie series in which the Digidestined (chosen children) float in the sky.

Miku is wearing the main character Taichi‘s goggles in addition to holding his Digivice, the tool the children use in the series to evolve the partner Digimon.

The butterflies in the image refer to the opening theme Butter-Fly, while the edges of the wings link back to Miku being digital also.

Goods

A variety of goods based on the Miku ✕ Agumon visual will be introduced during DigiFes 2019 this August. Those include a B2 Tapestry (2100 JPY), an Acrylic Stand (1600 JPY), and a CD shaped memo with an illustrated case included (980 JPY)

About the Event

These goods will be sold during DigiFes 2019, an exclusively Digimon-themed event that takes place at the Maihama Amphitheater, located in the Tokyo Disney Resort®.
Tickets are available through lottery and cost 8500 Yen.

For ticket holders, the goods will be on sale from 9:30AM to 1:30PM. Non-ticket holders can acquire these items between 2:00PM and 9:00PM.

The admission line for ticket holders opens from 7:30AM , while the line for non-ticket holders begins at 1:00PM.

The above times are in JST (Japanese Standard Time).

The Adventure Series’ cast is at the event, as well as Ayumi Miyazaki (composer of the Digivolution theme), and Ai Maeda (responsible for several ending themes).

More information

Hatsune Miku can always be found on Facebook (English and Japanese), Twitter (English and Japanese), Youtube and Weibo!
Event website
Atsuya Uki – Website / Tumblr
Kouji Wada (opening theme composer) – (Website / Blog)
Maihama Amphitheater
Tokyo Disney Resort®
Ayumi Miyazaki
Ai Maeda
Sekiranun Graffiti
Toei Animation (Japan)
Digimon Adventure Tri on Crunchyroll

The post Hatsune Miku x Digimon Adventure Merchandise Revealed! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Rana’s 3rd Birthday Piapro Collaboration
item.dc:creator: Lune☯n
item.description:
A Twitter user who goes by the name of @Ran53188 set up a Piapro collaboration to celebrate the pink-braided VOCALOID’s third birthday! Ranaトクロコラボ昨日で募集期間終了でしたが、絵師枠のみ延長します！また、絵師が集まらなかった場合MMDで静止画を作ってくださる方も募集します。https://t.co/QcI8grywZ1 #vocaloid_Rana #イラスト募集 #VOCALOID — Ran (@Ran53188) June 30, 2017 Project Details Ran wants to create a special Talk Loid video using Rana’s voice. Recruitment is open for illustrators and MikuMikuDance users. Tuning, illustrations …

The post Rana’s 3rd Birthday Piapro Collaboration appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
A Twitter user who goes by the name of @Ran53188 set up a Piapro collaboration to celebrate the pink-braided VOCALOID’s third birthday!

Ranaトクロコラボ
昨日で募集期間終了でしたが、絵師枠のみ延長します！
また、絵師が集まらなかった場合MMDで静止画を作ってくださる方も募集します。https://t.co/QcI8grywZ1 #vocaloid_Rana #イラスト募集 #VOCALOID

— Ran (@Ran53188) June 30, 2017

Project Details

Ran wants to create a special Talk Loid video using Rana’s voice.

Recruitment is open for illustrators and MikuMikuDance users. Tuning, illustrations and mixing is planned for this month while video creation begins in August. They want to upload the finished project in September, on Rana’s birthday.

Requirements

  • You must be able to participate in the discussion.
  • You have to submit before the deadline.
  • You must also be an illustrator or know how to use MikuMikuDance.

Additional Information

For more information or questions, you can contact Ran53188 on Twitter.

Piapro Collaboration
Rana V4 in the VOCALOID Shop
VOCALOID Rana’s Official Twitter

The post Rana’s 3rd Birthday Piapro Collaboration appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Huan Xiaoyi 3D Model for MikuMikuDance Released!
item.dc:creator: Lune☯n
item.description:
MMD modeler YYB uploaded the 3D MikuMikuDance model for Sharpkey’s voice library Huan Xiaoyi on both Bowlroll and Baidu for her fans to download and use. 幻晓伊！❤https://t.co/bakXQxPrpb pic.twitter.com/1UJKrYCuHB — 三目YYB (@1035517017) September 14, 2016 Who is Huan Xiaoyi? Huan Xioayi is a Chinese voice library developed by Boxstar for the new singing synthesis engine called Sharpkey. Earlier, …

The post Huan Xiaoyi 3D Model for MikuMikuDance Released! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
MMD modeler YYB uploaded the 3D MikuMikuDance model for Sharpkey’s voice library Huan Xiaoyi on both Bowlroll and Baidu for her fans to download and use.

幻晓伊！https://t.co/bakXQxPrpb pic.twitter.com/1UJKrYCuHB

— 三目YYB (@1035517017) September 14, 2016

Who is Huan Xiaoyi?

Huan Xioayi is a Chinese voice library developed by Boxstar for the new singing synthesis engine called Sharpkey. Earlier, YYB teased images of a MMD model for her, and now that 3D model is available for everyone to enjoy. Boxstar also uploaded a video of Huan Xioayi singing and dancing to a song called “极乐净土”.

MikuMikuDance 

MikuMikuDance (MMD) is a free animation software which allows you to create pictures and videos. It has a great amount of data available for you to use, from 3D models, effects, backgrounds and stages, and also to various pre-made motion data. It’s a great tool for beginners of all ages.

If you’ve used MikuMikuDance before, then you’re probably already familiar with how to download models from various sources and also with how it all works. But if you don’t, then don’t panic.
First of all, most MMD models come with a set of guidelines or terms of use, similarly to how most softwares do. Before you load the model into your version of MMD, you should always remind yourself to check the guidelines first. These guidelines are commonly referred to as “rules”.

The Rules

For this one, the terms of use are pretty simple. 

  • You cannot use this model commercially without permission from the author, that means that you cannot use it to make profit off of it.
    For example, you cannot sell artwork that contains a picture of this MMD model, and you also cannot put this model in a video that you plan to monetize on YouTube if you didn’t get YYB’s permission for it.
  • You must always give credit to the author. If you make a picture or video with this model you have to state somewhere in the description or in the artwork itself that YYB created the model.
  • If you would like to share this MMD model with your friends or family members, link them to the original uploads by YBB.
  • You can add clothing to this model if you want and also share your edited work with the public but you must include the exact name of the original upload when you do either.
  • You cannot put parts from this model on another model and provide a download for it.
  • The modifications you make to the 3D model has to be in YYB style. You cannot make a LAT, Animasa or TDA edit of this model using YYB’s model’s parts.
  • You also cannot use this model in a way that it can be harmful to society, for example using it to harass another MMD user or using it for political things.

The Model

YYB’s 3D model of Huan Xiaoyi contains enough facials for you to experiment with. There are 13 available for her eyes, 14 for her mouth, 11 for her eyebrows, and 14 miscellaneous ones listed as “other”. To name a few facials; it’s possible to make her wink, blink, smile and kiss, and you can also remove her outline and make her invisible.

Since Bowlroll and Baidu are different from DeviantArt or Mediafire, here’s a brief explanation on how to download the model files from either of the two sites.

For Bowlroll, it’s relatively simple. You just have to click the big red button that says “download”.

Baidu is a little bit more complicated, but once you get the hang of it, it’s just as simple.

 

When you open the page, you should see a folder called “MMD”. Click on that folder to open it.

When you open it, you should see a .zip file. Then you just hover over it and click the download icon.

 

 

You can download “Huan Xioayi YYB Style” down below.

Bowlroll

Baidu

More Information

For more information about Huan Xiaoyi and how to get her voice library, please check out our previous article.

The post Huan Xiaoyi 3D Model for MikuMikuDance Released! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Hatsune Miku V4X MMD Model by Yoistyle
item.dc:creator: Lune☯n
item.description:
3D modeler Yoistyle released a new model in celebration of Hatsune Miku’s birthday on August 31st. The design he chose to model is her new V4X outfit designed by iXima. Akuo, an artist on DeviantArt, collaborated with Yoistyle to create the textures. The model comes with two “readme’s”, one in English and one in Spanish. She also has a …

The post Hatsune Miku V4X MMD Model by Yoistyle appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
3D modeler Yoistyle released a new model in celebration of Hatsune Miku’s birthday on August 31st. The design he chose to model is her new V4X outfit designed by iXima. Akuo, an artist on DeviantArt, collaborated with Yoistyle to create the textures.

The model comes with two “readme’s”, one in English and one in Spanish. She also has a lot of facial expressions: 49 for her eyes, 21 for her mouth, 33 for her eyebrows, and 28 listed in the drop down menu for “other” facials, so you have plenty of options to choose from when you want to use her in your videos and pictures. Also included are three preview images of the model in different poses to show off what she looks like.

She’s available from Yoistyle’s BowlRoll account for free, so be sure to download her!

You can download Hatsune Miku V4X Yoistyle version here

If you want to use this 3D data, you’ll have to keep the following things in mind:

  • Be sure to always credit the creators, which in this case are Yoistyle and Akuo.
  • You cannot edit this model or redistribute it; that includes the textures.
  • Using this model for profit is prohibited.

Hatsune Miku is a character who belongs to Crypton Future Media, and due to that there are a few extra guidelines you have to keep in mind when you upload pictures or videos with this MMD model. Be sure to read the license before downloading this data.

The English license is available here.

The Japanese license, which provides more in-depth information regarding her character guidelines, is available here.

If you wish to contact Yoistyle or just want to see more of his work, then you can do so through Facebook, DeviantArt, YouTube, and of course, on Twitter.

Hatsune Miku V4X Product Page
©Crypton Future Media

The post Hatsune Miku V4X MMD Model by Yoistyle appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Otomachi Una Additional MMD Data Released!
item.dc:creator: Lune☯n
item.description:
Not one, not two, but a total of three new Otomachi Una MMD models are available for download. You can now download them on the Niconi Solid website. The Models The first model showcases Una rocking a white dress, the second one features her in a blue dress, and the last model portrays her with a tan while …

The post Otomachi Una Additional MMD Data Released! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Not one, not two, but a total of three new Otomachi Una MMD models are available for download. You can now download them on the Niconi Solid website.

The Models

The first model showcases Una rocking a white dress, the second one features her in a blue dress, and the last model portrays her with a tan while wearing the same white dress. If you would like to download these models, click here.

The Motion Data

In addition, a few new motion data are available, the first of which is called “オーディエンスのループ” (Audience Loop) where the character jumps and cheers. Click here to download “Audience Loop”.

Second up is a motion named “壁ドン” (Kabedon) where the character slams their hand against a “wall” and pins you as a viewer against that “wall”, a very common action in shoujo anime and manga. Click here to download “Kabedon”.

–
–
–

The third one is simply named “走るループ” (Running) where the character runs in the same spot. Click here to download “Running”.

Last up is “あざとかわいいターン” (Azato Kawaii Turn) where the character jumps and turns 180° twice, a full 360° spin in total. Click here to download “Azato Kawaii Turn”.

 

Otomachi Una belongs to MTK and INTERNET Co., Ltd. ©MTK

Internet Co.’s Official Website
Otomachi Una’s Official Website

The guidelines for this set of 3D models are exactly the same as the ones for the formerly released models. You can view them here.

For more information, check out our previous articles on Otomachi Una below!

VOCALOIDs Sugar and Spicy Are Otomachi Una!
New Demo Song for Otomachi Una
Otomachi Una Demo for Sugar and Spicy Revealed!
VOCALOIDs Sugar and Spicy Announced!

The post Otomachi Una Additional MMD Data Released! appeared first on VNN.
